title: Tuesday Post Show (7-13-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (7-13-21)
description:
Bobby starts with a few crazy news stories. A video on TikTok of a teen who hit a golf ball and it was struck by lightning. A guy who found a winning lottery ticket in a junk drawer and a wedding photographer who called the bride the name of the groom’s ex-girlfriend. Campers had to get rabies shots after a sleepover at the zoo. Eddie is wondering why the planet hates him right now. Every single appliance is broken. Bobby on the power of positive thinking vs. practical thinking. Bobby also gives insight on what he would do for his 3rd book.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
